author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Sometimes, it’s simply not enough to read or watch the grimness that we crave. Sometimes you want to pilot that descent into darkness, be the one fighting against the mayhem—or causing it. For those of us who like to sit back, hop on the sticks, and play the bloodshed, the Grimdark Magazine review team has […]

The post The Best Dark Fantasy, Horror, and Sci-Fi Games of 2025 appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: The Best Dark Fantasy, Horror, and Sci-Fi Games of 2025
